name: Cube Cliff - for HTC Vive
description:
Have you ever just wanted to throw stuff off a cliff and watch it break? 

Sure you have!

This project continues my mild obsession with cubes. I wanted to make a game running on a timer with points and a score.  I tried to think of the simplest possible structure that could qualify as a game and this is what I came up with.

I've got cube after cube instantiating and your job is to throw them off the edge of a cliff as fast as you can and see how many you can break within a minute. Hectic yet oddly satisfying.
